text: (irantu talakkuc colliya) pinnar (munravatakavum) avalai avan talakkuc collivittal avanallata (veru) kanavanai aval manantu kollum varai aval avanukku akumanavalalla. (Anal, avanallata veroruvan avalai tirumanam ceytu) avanum avalait talakkuk kurivittal, atanpin (avalum mutal kanavanum akiya) iruvarum (cerntu) allah erpatuttiya varampai nilai niruttivitalam enru enninal avarkal iruvarum (tirumpavum tirumanam ceytu kontu manavalvil) mintu kolvatil avarkal mitu kurramillai. Ivai allah erpatuttiya catta varampukalakum. Arintukollum makkalukkaka ivarrai avan vivarikkiran
